plot: A renegade scientist in San Francisco has found a way to create a new creature called a Neo-Aragami without the power of Susanoo. When these monsters start to terrorize California, the U.S. turns to the old members of the Terrestrial Administration Center (TAC) for help.
opening_theme: "Eternal Truth" by Keiko Kimoto, Masaaki Iizuka
ending_theme: "Second Kiss" by Mihao Matsuba, Masaaki Iizuka (eps 1-2)
